body: This is kinda sad if for no other reason, hes probably one of the harem protagonists that least deserved to get NTR'd. The only one I can think of that is more ballsy/awesome than him is the MC from Hagure Yuusha no Estetica. <----literally best badass with a harem in a non-hentai (but lets be honest. it was like half a step shy from being one)
